alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:44PM EDT until July 29 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND AND CENTRAL PRINCE EDWARD COUNTIES... At 643 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prospect, or near Hampden Sydney, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Farmville, Hampden Sydney College, Longwood University, Hampden Sydney, Guinea Mills, Darlington Heights, Prospect, Rice, Raines Tavern, Tuggle, Angola, Allens Mill, McRae, Hawk, Kingsville, Elam, Reeds, Stoddert, and Worsham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
